_comment: Unified Myki Configuration - Multi-user support with secure credential management

_instructions.2_create_env: Copy .env.example to .env and add credentials there (NOT in this config file)
_instructions.3_credentials: For each user key in this config, add 3 secrets to .env:
_instructions.4_example: For config key 'koustubh' add: MYKI_USERNAME_KOUSTUBH, MYKI_CARDNUMBER_KOUSTUBH, MYKI_PASSWORD_KOUSTUBH
_instructions.5_security: NEVER commit .env file - credentials must stay out of version control

_field_notes.skipDates: Array of YYYY-MM-DD dates to exclude from tracking (OPTIONAL)
_field_notes.manualAttendanceDates: Array of YYYY-MM-DD dates when you drove to work instead of using PTV (OPTIONAL)
_field_notes.endDate: String, YYYY-MM-DD format, inclusive end (OPTIONAL - defaults to today)

john._note: Each user is a separate Myki account - they can track different cards/stations

_multi_user_explanation.scenario: Multiple people, each with their own Myki account
_multi_user_explanation.config_key: The key (e.g. 'koustubh', 'john') is just a config identifier - actual username goes in .env
_multi_user_explanation.credentials: All sensitive data (username, card number, password) stored securely in .env file
_multi_user_explanation.authentication: Phase 1 authenticates EACH user separately and saves individual sessions
_multi_user_explanation.tracking: Phase 2 uses each user's session to fetch their transaction data
_multi_user_explanation.benefit: One tool can track attendance for multiple people automatically

_manual_attendance_explanation.purpose: Track days when you drove to work instead of using public transport
_manual_attendance_explanation.display: Manual dates shown in orange/amber in calendar, PTV attendance in red
_manual_attendance_explanation.statistics: Both manual and PTV attendance counted in total days attended
_manual_attendance_explanation.format: Array of YYYY-MM-DD date strings, e.g. ['2025-05-10', '2025-05-15']

_working_days_info.definition: Monday-Friday, excluding Melbourne VIC public holidays and user skip dates
_working_days_info.attendance_rule: Day marked attended if â‰¥1 'Touch off' at targetStation on working day OR listed in manualAttendanceDates
